mapper.select: SELECT t_order.oid, uid, pid, t_order_item.price, t_order_item.num, t_order_item.title, t_order.total_price AS realPrice, t_order.recv_name As recvName, t_order.created_time As createdTime, t_order.status, t_order_item.image FROM t_order_item LEFT JOIN t_order ON t_order.oid =t_order_item.oid WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY t_order_item.created_time DESC
